metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, A Brave and Leisurely Beast is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: A Brave and Leisurely Beast has sections analyzed in the following keys: A Minor, F♯ Minor, C♯ Minor,  and F Minor.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
